content.text: Doing well, just got home from work. How about you?
I'm doing okay, thanks for asking. I'm just getting ready to start dinner.
I'm making a simple bean soup. I love the smell of beans cooking.
Beans are one of my favorite foods. I love them in chili.
I love chili too! I usually make it with ground beef, but I've been thinking about trying it with turkey.
Turkey chili would be delicious! I bet it would be a lot healthier too.
I think I'm going to give it a try this weekend.
That's great! I'll have to come over for dinner and try it.
You're welcome to come over any time!
Thanks, I might just take you up on that.
Great! I'll be sure to make enough chili
